item.title: 5 Buddhist Tibetan Rites
item.description:
Constant movement in each excercice

Spin with extended arms
Lay down and move your legs upwards while moving chin to chest
Sit down on your knees, arms in hips and stretch forward
Sit down and shift your hips up and forwards
Seal pose to down facing dog
Meditate
item.dc:creator: Nuvhandra

item.title: index
item.description:
Intro
Welcome to a journey of exploration, creativity, and self-discovery. This book is a tapestry woven from my ideas, projects, drawings, thoughts, and learning – a reflection of my multifaceted interests and passions. At its core, this work aims to enrich the reader with knowledge that fosters revolution and independence, enabling a harmonious coexistence with technology and the environment. It is a call to embrace a world without borders, where self-sustaining communities thrive on the free exchange of knowledge, living in harmony with the natural world. As an individual with a deep appreciation for art, music, engineering, technology, sciences, and philosophy, I strive to weave these diverse threads into a cohesive narrative. This book is not merely a collection of words and images; it is a window into my experiences, my life, and my vision for a better world. Through these pages, you will embark on a journey that transcends boundaries, challenging conventional thinking and inspiring a new paradigm of living. We will delve into the realms of art, exploring its power to evoke emotions and provoke thought. We will venture into the depths of science and technology, unraveling their potential to revolutionize our understanding of the world and our place within it. Moreover, this book is a testament to the belief that knowledge should be freely shared, empowering individuals and communities to forge their own paths towards self-sufficiency and harmony with the natural world. It is a call to action, inviting readers to embrace their curiosity, question the status quo, and actively participate in shaping a future where innovation and sustainability go hand in hand.


Projects

Protein Farm
Mycelium Box
Training Armor
Ideas


Body Movement

5 Buddhist Tibetan Rites
Neck
Animal
Tai Chi
Kung Fu
Programming
#include <stdio.h> int main(){ return 0; } Copy
item.dc:creator: Nuvhandra

item.description:
Tengo que escanear todos mis dibujos, pasarlos a SVG (python script) y empezar a escribir sobre ellos.
Separarlo todo por ideas y estructurarlas, aprender uso de tags y demás para enfocar los proyectos.

Escanear dibujos
pasar a SVG, hacer python script que cambiando parámetros lo hace en automático
Escribir entradas todos los días
item.dc:creator: Nuvhandra
